required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk in General Practice in France: Cardiovascular Risk Week
clinical_study.official_title: Cardiovascular Risk in General Practice in France

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the proportion of patients which present a high cardiovascular risk estimated by the SCORE scale, in general practice consultations of the 7 French regions (Paris area, North-East, Paris basin, West, South-West, South- East, Mediterranean area)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of cardiovascular risk in general practice in France estimated by the SCORE scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of cardiovascular risk in general practice in France estimated by the Framingham 2008 scale D'Agostino
Evaluation of cardiovascular risk in general practice in France estimated by the Framingham 1998 scale Wilson
Evaluation of arteries age evaluation by SCORE

arm_group.description: For this group of patients, the cardiovascular risk will be evaluated by several tools: the SCORE scale, the Framingham 2008 scale d'Agostino and the 1998 scale Wilson ;

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Without any personal history of coronary disease
- Non treated with lipid-lowering agents
- Lipid test = 1 year old
- Presenting at least one cardiovascular risk
- Visiting their General Practitioner
Exclusion Criteria:

overall_official.affiliation: Institut Pasteur de Lille - Unité d'Epidémiologie et de santé publique Inserm UMR 744
CHU Rangueil - Service de Cardiologie B - Toulouse
